name: LockVenture: The Beginning
description:
Asalam o Alaikum 

LockVenture is Part of our new Series.

This is the first of the LockVenture Game Series for Gdevelop Jam.

it will receive more update soon.

Story: 

5 years ago a man lost his brother. For 5 years he was searching for him but could not find him. When he lost all hope, He found a clue. A map that can lead him to his brother. But a question he is asking himself.

is my brother alive...

Mechanics: 

You found a bundler is Caves that can build you a gate that can lead you to your brother. But you must fill his requirements so first.

Collect Coins By Avoiding Slimes to Get the Required items for Builder

Caves are filled with Slimes so Be carful.

Controls:    

A & D      For Movement

Space     for Jumping

Q & E      to Switch between Caves

Esc           for Game Option

Pro Tip:

in Between Levels Some Controls will not work because its Puzzle Based

Thank You for Playing...
